1.title: The details of the giantesses

choices: Have Julie give him a tour of her world
Spend some time getting to know Julie better
Ask Julie to tell him more about his new role as king
Invite Julie to go back to Earth with him
Request that Julie brings his family to Macroterra to live with him
11.content:
It started out as another normal day for Jack. He was just walking home from his job after a hard day's work; the same routine as always. He never suspected that anything significant would happen to him. Yet, something very significant most certainly was going to happen to him today. As Jack walked down the sidewalk, he passed by a dark alleyway. Out of the corner of his eye, Jack saw a flash of blue light from down the dark alley. Curious, he walked into the alley. As soon as he entered it, Jack was stunned by what he saw.

Hovering inches off the ground right in front of him was a colossal swirling vortex! It was almost as tall as the massive buildings on either side of it, and Jack could only stare in awe at the huge portal to who-knows-where. Suddenly, as Jack was standing there in a daze, a huge hand reached out of the portal and grabbed him! The massive fingers that were easily twice as long as he was tall wrapped around his entire body, and with a gentle but firm grip pulled him through the portal. Jack squeezed his eyes shut in fear, as he was certain that whatever had grabbed him was surely going to kill him now.

However, he soon felt himself being released from the grip of the massive hand and placed carefully onto the ground. Jack hesitantly opened his eyes to see just what he was captured by, but he never expected what he saw: towering over him with a tender smile on her face was a beautiful young woman, no less than 250 feet tall! This massive girl wore a pink tanktop and a blue mini-skirt, and her long blond hair flowed gorgeously down her back. She was wearing a pair of light blue flipflops, and her massive toes each had bright red nail polish applied to them. As Jack looked closer, he realized that her fingernails also had this same red nail polish as well. She was truly a figure of beauty, and her ample bosom was simply icing on the cake.

Yet despite this probably 19 year old girl's undeniable beauty, Jack couldn't help being terrified by her. The smile on her face did nothing to calm him down, as the only thing that he could imagine at the moment was how easily she could crush his pathetic body into paste beneath her enormous feet. After all, no matter how pretty she was, Jack was nothing but a bug compared to her sheer size. He simply couldn't think of her doing anything but crushing him like one. Just then, the giantess reached out toward him with her hand. Jack instinctively curled into a ball and began begging for his life.

"Please Miss, don't hurt me! I'll do anything you want, just don't kill me!"

The girl's hand quickly receded as she heard this. She then spoke to him with a noticeable hint of sadness in her voice.

"Hurt you? Why would I ever hurt you?"

She then noticed Jack shaking in fear, and immediately panicked.

"Oh no! Did I really scare you that much?! Oh, I'm so sorry! You must absolutely hate me now, Master! Please forgive me Master, I will readily accept any punishment that you choose to give me!"

Jack lifted his head up and searched the room, looking for this person that the titaness had referred to as 'master'. However, as he looked around, it became apparent to him that he was the only one in the room aside from the girl herself... But she couldn't have been talking to him, could she?! He had to know.

"Ummm... Who exactly were you calling 'master', Miss?"

"What? Why you of course. Do you see anyone else in this room?"

"Well, no... But me? Your master?! HOW?!"

"Oh dear! I completely forgot to explain the circumstances! Stupid, stupid, stupid!" She said, smacking herself on the head with each 'stupid' at the end.

"Calm down Miss, just explain to me what's going on..."

"Alright Master, I-"

"Hold on a second. Please, just call me Jack. It feels weird having someone as huge as you calling me 'master'."

"As you wish, Jack. Oh, and I'm sorry I didn't introduce myself sooner. My name is Julie, and I shall be your loyal guardian from this day forward. Anyway, allow me to explain. You are now on the planet Macroterra, a parallel world exactly opposite the world you know as Earth. With the exception of the identical wildlife to your home world, ours is a world inhabited solely by giantesses. As for why I brought you here, it's part of a tradition on Macroterra. You see, every hundred years, we select one man from Earth and bring him to Macroterra to serve as our king. You have been chosen to rule as our king, Jack."

"WHAT?! Me?! The king of an entire planet?! But why me?!"

"It's simple, Jack. Our king is always selected based on one defining condition: they must have a pure heart. You have proven to fit that criteria better than anyone else we have observed, and as such, I was selected to bring you here."

"But... Okay, this is just too much... First of all, how did you bring me here in the first place?!"

"Oh, you'll find that our technology is a fair bit more advanced than that of your home planet. We have the concept of inter-dimensional travel mastered, making transport between here and Earth a rather simple feat."

"Alright... Well what did you mean by that 'guardian' bit?"

"Well you see Jack, the first one who makes contact with the new king upon his arrival on Macroterra is assigned to serve as the king's guardian. It is now my duty to show you around our world, teach you anything that you need to know about our culture, explain the details of your job to you, and most importantly ensure that no harm should ever come to you. In essence, I am now your loyal right hand who shall stay by your side for the remainder of your life as king."

"Wow... This is sure a whole lot to take in... So I'm seriously the new king of your entire planet? This isn't just some kind of joke?"

"Oh no, Master Jack! I would never attempt to deceive you! I ensure that everything that I have told you thus far has been the truth!"

"Alright Julie, I believe you... But this is just crazy... I've never had anything special about me in my entire life, and now I'm leader of a whole planet that I've never even heard of?! It's just... Wow..."

"I understand if you need a moment to take all this in, Master..."

"Okay... And I thought I told you that you could just call me Jack..."

"Ah, yes... My sincerest apologies..."

"It's alright Julie, really."


Jack then sat down and began to think things over. What would he do first now that he was king of an entire planet?!
11.title: King Jack, Ruler of Macroterra

choices: Jack is tired enough to fall asleep
Jack is restless and is left with his thoughts
Jack is restless and, ignoring Julie's warnings, he heads outside by himself
111.content:
"Well Julie I suppose you could give me a tour of Macroterra" Jack asked, quite terrified

"Yes, as you wish Master... Oh, I mean Jack!" Julie said, blushing as she corrected herself.

She motioned for Jack to follow her through a giant door, and as it opened, Jack's mouth dropped open in awe at the sight. The world outside was even bigger than the inside of the building. Gigantic multi-colored birds flew around singing a very abnormal tune. Instead of the normal bird whistling the birds actually sang proper words, but their voices were very high pitched.

"Welcome Master to your home, Enjoy your land and all the glow" They sang.

Jack gasped in shock as he heard the birds singing like this.

"Oh those are the KoKo birds they have human minds when it comes to singing, a myth has it they can tell the future and they sing like normal human birds when someone dies, although it has never happened before..." Julie explained. Jack just nodded

They walked further outside and noticed several other gigantic women and young girls, and as they walked by, the girls all bowed saying "Welcome, Master."

Julie led Jack around the area until it was sunset, but the strangest part was the fact the sun was a deep blue color instead of the golden glow he was used to.

"Jack, It is getting late now. I advise for you to go to your chambers if you don't want to be eaten alive by any of the nocturnal predators of our planet."

"Ummm, okay then..." Jack replied, nervously looking toward the bushes as he swore he heard a low growling coming from behind one of them.

Julie then carried him to what appeared to be his new sleeping area, and it was huge! She placed Jack down on the floor to allow him a chance to admire his new quarters. The room had an appearance that fitted its description as the bedroom of royalty, but it also had a cozy aura about it. The walls were painted with a pattern of black & gold, and furniture with matching colors adorned the entire room.

"Uh, Julie? A little help with the bed?" Jack asked, trying to climb into the gigantic bed.

"Oh, sorry Jack!"

She quickly picked him back up and placed him into the bed. Jack thanked Julie for her assistance before she left the room.

"Whew..." Jack said as he sat down on the gigantic plush pillow. "I kinda miss being back home..."

Jack let out a sigh before trying to get to sleep.
111.title: Tour of Macroterra

choices: Jack has a strange dream while he sleeps.
Someone comes into Jack's room and wakes him up in the middle of the night.
Jack wakes up the next morning without any issues.
1111.content:
As Jack listened to the flowing creek beside the palace, he wondered what would be in store for him in this new world. He wasn't used to being a king of anything, let alone an entire planet of giantesses. His parents would be worried, and his job manager would get frustrated with him if he was absent for more than one day. All his friends would probably wonder where he'd gone. They would never know that he was no longer be a resident of Earth, but of Macroterra instead.

Then, Jack realized that although it might take a while to adapt, being a king might not be so bad in the long run. After all, Julie and all the other women he had seen were all beautiful beyond imagining. Not only that, but they all seemed to be loyal and compassionate as well. On his way here, he had seen many inventions that would have made Earth's greatest technology seem like children's toys by comparison. He was surprised he made it to the palace at all, gaping at everything along the way. Now that he thought about it, their technology was far more advanced than that of Earth's. If he could take some of their medicine back home he could become the hero that cured all diseases known to man, or he could end world hunger with seeds that grew a limitless supply of fruit. Feeling the soft silk of the bedsheets beneath him, Jack couldn't even count all the new opportunities that had been opened up to him.

However, how would he even get back home? He could've sworn the portal had closed behind him when he entered it... Then again, how was the portal even created in the first place? Surely if these giant women could open a portal to a different world once, they should be able to do it again. Right?

"Well, maybe I'll just hangout here for a while and decide what I really want to do later..." Jack thought to himself.

Before he nodded off and, he made a vow to become the greatest king Macroterra had ever seen. With that, he watched the bright blue moonlight start to fade, more and more, until it was complete darkness.
1111.title: Jack's abitious plans

choices: Can't be allowed to leave now that he knows about Macroterra.
Would be allowed to leave if he wants to.
11112.content:
The man was in his room, standing on his bed.

"Jack..... Jack....."

He looked at him, but it was too dim to see the man. But he was a man and Jack's size.

"Wake up. I need help. Please Jack."

Jack finally responded with a quiet "What?"

The man let out a breath.

"I was behind the portal and got sucked in. Everything's so huge and I just want to get out of here. Please help me!" He got frantic and loud at the end. The door opened and the light flashed on. Julie stood in the doorway.

"Mast- Jack, what's wrong?"

The man started running back in sheer terror as Julie approached. Her eyes grew wide in surprise. She must not have noticed him come in the portal.

"Who are you?" Julie asked.

With the lights on, Jack finally got a good look at him. He had a very thin, but not unhealthy body. He was wearing jeans and a sweatshirt with Yellowstone plastered on it. He had shaggy black hair, and it turned out the man was only about 16. He started to stutter out a few words but gave up the futile attempt. Julie approached him and reached down. She grabbed him and brought him to her face.

"I won't do anything to you, just tell me your name please." Her voice was soft and non-threatening.

"I-I'm Zach." the man said nervously.

was clearly still scared but managed to get those words out.

"Well Zach, how did you get here?"

He swallowed deeply, still unable to get over Julie's massive size.

"I was behind the portal and it pulled me in. Please, I didn't mean to-"

Julie hushed Zach and set him on the bed.

"I need to consult someone about this. I'll be right back. Please wait here for now." Julie said as she left the room.

She came back in a few hours with the news. Zach...
11112.title: Wait.....

choices: Jack asks Julie to sleep with him (NOT Sex)
To give him a good night Kiss
1112.content:
Jack laid on the massive pillow while thinking. It was hard to believe that, just a few hours ago, he was once a normal guy. Now is the new king of a race of titan sized woman. He couldn't help but feel unsure of his new role. He had never so much as lead a scout troop before. Let alone an entire planet.

Soon his fears got the best of him.

"What if I fail? What if I accidentally start a war? What all the plants die, thus leading to the fall of the planet's economy? Not to mention Macroterra would become a barren wasteland!

At that moment someone entered the room, causing Jack to cry out in fear.

"Jack! Are you okay?" It was none other than Julie, the first giantess Jack met.

"Jack, I'm sorry if I woke you up."

"Don't worry Julie. I couldn't sleep."

"Is there something wrong?"

Jack sighs before he closed eyes. "I don't think I'm fit to be king."

Julie's face fell a little.

"Why would you even think that?" she asked, as her gigantic body drops onto the bed beside him.

"Well for one thing, I don't know anything about being a ruler. I have absolutely no experience. What if I screw up so badly that I ruin your whole world?" Then Jack felt something large, yet soft, rub his back gently. It was Julie's finger.

"I know this seems like an overwhelming challenge, but you will have help. Me and the others will teach you everything you need to know. Beside, you already know the most important thing a king needs."

"What's that?"

"You have a heart of gold," she smiled. "Also you're quite handsome too."

Jack took a double take after what the giantess just said. Julie giggles as she got up to leave.

"Wait! There's something I want to ask you." Jack stated.

"Sure, your wish is my command." As she bowed.

What does Jack want?
1112.title: Jack's thoughts

11121.content:
"Would you please sleep with me?" Jack asked timidly.

"What did you say?" she smirked.

Blushing red, Jack realize what he just said. "I didn't mean it like that! I meant sleep in the same bed as me. I could use the company. Plus the bed is large enough for us to share."

"Oh really?" she replied with a raised eyebrow. Jack's face was still bright red with embarrassment. He mentally scolded himself. You' idiot! What were you thinking? Would you please sleep with me? What am I? five years old. "I am so stupid!" he cried and smacked his head.

"Of course I will."

"Excuse me?"

"Of course I'll sleep with you."

"Julie you don't have to. Just forget I said that."

"But it would be a honor. I just need to change. I'll be right back, little master.” She giggled before leaving.

As she strolled to her chambers, she recalled the days when she and council observed the planet Earth. She was intrigued by the relationship between men and women. For the past few years she and the council studied Jack. From what they had seen, Jack was pure of heart. He would always help those in need. Even if they were total strangers. This quality was what Julie liked the most about him, and it even led her to develop a crush on him. So when she was chosen to be his guardian, she was overjoyed.

She arrived at her chambers and looked inside her closet. "I screwed up the first time I met Jack. Now I have to make a great second impression on him."

Back in Jack's room, Jack was still on the pillow waiting for Julie. I wonder where she is? He thought. Moments later his door opened, and Julie entered the room. Julie wore a yellow nightgown which showed a good amount of cleavage.

"Hello little master, do you like what you see?" she spoke with a seductive grin.

"Whoa, you look beautiful."

"Thank you, little master." she replied as she climbs into bed and covers herself with her bed sheets. "Good night little master."

"Good night Julie."

Julie grabbed Jack and pulled him close to her, and within a matter of minutes, the two fell asleep in eachother's embrace.


Who Wakes up first?
11121.title: The start of a relationship.

choices: Jack and Julie go the meeting
111211.content:
Julie woke up first with a yawn. She opened her eyes and looked down a little to see Jack still curled up in her hand, snuggling against her breast.

"Awww, how adorable..." She smiled.

Julie began to gently stroke his back with her finger.

"Wake up little guy."

Jack woke up and rubbed his eyes.

"Wow... That was a strangely wonderful dream." While awake, his vision is still a little fuzzy. "Julie. She was amazing."

"Thank you, my cute little master." Julie said with a giggle.

This shocked Jack into full awareness. He looked around quickly and saw where he was now.

"Oh. My Gosh!" Jack gasped.

"Did you sleep well?" Julie asked.

"Julie, I'm so sorry! Could you please forgive me?" Jack said in a panic as he quickly pulled himself away from Julie's breast.

"It's okay Jack, I don't mind. After all, I was the one who placed you there in the first place." The giantess responded. "Besides, I bet you really enjoyed it." Julie said teasingly.

Jack still blushed from knowing he had laid against her huge bosom all night long. How come she's not mad? But then again she did choose to sleep with me last night... Is there a connection?

"Jack, can I ask you a question?" Julie request.

"Okay, what do you want?" Jack answered

"I know we met only yesterday and all... But do you like me? I mean really like me."

"What do you mean?"

"I mean more than just a friend."

"Oh..."

It dawned on Jack just what she meant. He didn't know what to say. Sure she was beautiful and nice. On the other hand, he barely knew the giantess. Not to mention he was soon going to be King, and she his servant. Would a relationship between them even be possible? Plus there was the size difference that they would have to overcome.

"Julie, I would love to have a relationship with you. You are truly a wonderful woman. But could we please take slow? I'd really like to get to know you more before rushing into anything." Jack replied.

"I understand." She grinned. It took all her will power to keep her from jumping for joy.

Just then, an another giantess step in. This woman looked to be a few years older than Julie, but she was still the exact same height. Her was hair dark brown, and was tied up in a bun. Her eyes were green. She wore a red dress shirt and white pants. She also had green glasses and red high heel shoes. she was holding a clip board in one hand and a pen in another.

She tells them Jack has a meeting to attend to.
111211.title: First morning of being king

choices: Someone he doesn't know comes to his rescue!
Nobody comes to save him... RUN!
1113.content:
As Jack lay on the pillow, head reeling from the day's events, a howl shattered the silence around him. He sprung to his feet, glancing around nervously in both directions, then smacked himself on the head as Julie had done earlier.

"Jack, you sissy, that's coming from outside... It's nothing to be scared of..." he muttered to himself as the howl rang forth a second time.

Jack raised his head to peer out a window by his bed, watching as dark clouds rolled past a moon unfamiliar to him and obscuring it. But from what he could tell, it appeared to be full. Jack slowly eased himself back onto the pillow and shuddered as the howl met his ears for a third time. He cringed and clamped his hands over his ears, and although he could no longer hear the howl, his curiosity was eating him up.

Despite the warning Julie had given him, Jack was tempted to go outside and find whatever was making the howling, just to shut it up if anything else. He lowered his hands and took a deep breath before crawling to the edge of the bed. Designed for someone of a much greater stature, the ground was quite a ways off. Jack frowned and looked around for another means of descent, his eyes finally resting upon the covers of the bed. They lay draped over the bed, and they dangled off the ground slightly. Jack gulped as he gripped them in his hands, and he almost gave up and went back to bed before a fourth howl prompted him to do otherwise.

Hand-over-hand, Jack used all the strength he could muster to lower himself to the ground. By the time he got there, he collapsed and fell onto the ground, gulping lungfuls of air. He staggered to his feet and rested his hands on his knees, eyes locked on the door. Jack regained his composure before dashing across the wooden floor, glistening in the moonlight, and slipping underneath the door.

The world awaiting him on the other side of the door rendered Jack speechless. The trees and bushes rose high above him, their canopies disappearing into the darkness. Even the grass was almost as tall as him. He stumbled forward and widened his eyes, taken aback at how it differed from the environment of earth. He pushed his way through the grass and forged a path through, into the forest. At one point, he even noticed a few ants the sizes of horses to him scurry by.

It was easy to lose track of time in the wilderness of Macroterra, and this finally struck Jack. He didn't even know how long he'd been outside, but he knew it had been a long time. He started to turn back, but then realized he didn't know where "Back" was; he was hopelessly lost. He staggered through the darkness, thrusting the blades of grass out of his way frantically in an attempt to find his way back.

"Julie?" He called. "Julie! Where are you? I'm lost! Can you hear me?" He already knew the answer to his last question; there was no way a 250-foot woman could hear him, but apparently, something else had.

An ear-splitting howl resounded from somewhere behind him, the very same howl he'd been hearing earlier. Jack froze as he heard the leaves behind him rustling, and whipped around to face whatever it was. To his horror, a paw stepped out from the shrubbery, then another, and then the head of the largest wolf he'd ever seen. The wolf was as black as the night itself, with grey paws and belly. It must've been at least 100 feet tall; it would've been big, even for Julie. For Jack, it was an utter monstrosity.

The wolf slowly paced towards him, its lip curled in a menacing snarl. It was glaring directly at him, clearing the short distance between them unsettlingly fast. Jack backed away from it worriedly, nearly wetting himself in the process. It finally struck him that it would be very easy for someone like him to die in this universe of giantesses.

Without warning, Jack stumbled and fell onto his back, crying out in pain. The wolf lunged forward and stood directly above him, saliva dripping from its mouth. A massive paw landed on either side of him.

"Nice doggy?" Jack whimpered.


What will happen to Jack next?
1113.title: The Howl of the Wolf

11132.content:
Jack ran through the large forest as fast as he could with a 100ft wolf running after him. Jack knew that the wolf was to large to outrun, the only thing keeping jack alive was the fact that the grass, which towered over him in ease, was hiding him in the shadows, also the fact that it was night outside also increased his chances of survival. Jack zigzagged through the grass, trying to confuse the wolf. Jack hated his stupidity, how could he go exploring through a jungle he knew nothing about. He wished that he listened to Julie.

Jack was getting exhausted, he had managed to dodge the wolf 🐺 for 5 minutes so far but he couldn’t keep it up. Jack running through the woods sees a towering figure ahead of him. This figure completely dwarfed him and even the wolf itself, jack was feeling comfortable, maybe just maybe it was a building from the city, and if it was then he could get help. Jack ran closer and closer to the towering figure, it wasn’t a building. Jack only a few feet from the figure covered in darkness finally was able to make out its form. Jack soon realizes that this figure was a women, and this women was even bigger than Julie. Julie stood about 250 feet tall, but this women was 300 feet tall. The women had long Black hair that came down to her waist, and dark black eyes as she looked at jack running towards her, and she wore amor that made her look almost like a amazon warrior, but the amor was more advanced, jack could tell seeing as how it had glowing purple lines that formed their own separate patterns. The women also wore a SyFy looking gun around her waist and a large metal sword 🗡 on her back. Who ever she was, she was jacks best chance for survival.

The women runs towards jack with booming footsteps. Jack watches her black armored boots come closer and closer to him. Honestly jack couldn’t help but wonder is this women going to step on him.

“Hey! Hey! Hey! Slow down your going to step on me!” Jack yells with his eyes closed as the women runs closer to him.

Jack opens his eyes as a few minutes pass, and sees that the women had stepped over him as she runs towards the wolf. The women holds up her right hand, and a large staff appears As if by magic, as the women grabs the staff the very tip generates large amounts of electricity. Jack could see that The women was fast and was obviously trained, she moved swiftly as she attacked the wolf with her electrified staff.

The battle was over in a few seconds. The wolf let out a huge yelp as it was electrified by the women’s staff. The wolf falls down completely knocked out, which totally surprised Jack. The voltage in that staff was so strong that even though it was far away from him, his hair on his arm and in his head stood up from the static electricity. Jack knew that if that staff even grazes him, he would be instantly killed.

The women who was staring at the wolf for what seemed like a eternity, finally looks at jack with cold eyes. The women walks towards jack, her footsteps shaking the ground below jack, making it difficult for jack to stand up. The women kneels down on the ground a few feet away from jack. Jack being so close to the women was able to make out her face a little better, especially with her kneeling down. The women had a X shaped scar on her right cheek, other than the scare the women was pretty in jacks opinion, the women was as pretty as Julie, but unlike Julie this giant women scared him. The women was battle hardened, cold, like she saw the whole world as her enemy, and was ready to attack at a moments notice. Jack couldn’t help but back away as he looked the women straight in the eyes.

“Your majesty, please let me bring you back to the castle.” The women says colds, bowing her head.

The women puts her right hand down on the ground, the staff she was holding disappeared as if it had never existed. Jack was not so sure if letting this women pick him up was the wises decision, but he didn’t want to be attacked by anymore wild creatures, so against his better judgment he slowly walked into the open palm of the giant women.

The ride was surprisingly comfortable, as the women walks through the forest. It didn’t take the women long to reach the city, the woods seemed to fade away as the large trees where replaced with large buildings. You sat comfortably in the middle of the women’s gigantic palm, jack would glance up at the women’s face as she walked. The women didn’t look at him at all her eyes remained forward, it was as if jack wasn’t even worth her time.

As the women walks through the big open streets jack realizes that their where a lot of women out on the street, none where as tall as the women holding him. As jack passed these women they bow their heads in respect. Many of them who’re smiles on their faces as they looked at jack, and many more whispered to one another and giggled, jack couldn’t help but wonder do these women ever sleep.

The women holding jack soon makes it back to the castle that rested in the middle of the city. It was just as grand as the first time jack had laid eyes on it. In the middle of the front golden gates was Julie, and she looked upset.

“Catherine thank god you found him.” Julie says as she runs towards the women holding jack.

‘So her name is Catherine?’ You think to your self as you look at the women.

Julie while looking at Catherine wears a smile on her face, but as her vision shifts to you, her face becomes stern.

“I’m in trouble.” Jack whispers to himself

Jack knew that look all to well, his mother would give him that look when ever he was in trouble. Looks like their was trouble in paradise.
11132.title: Saved by a SYFY Amazon, trouble in paradise.

111321.content:
Julie remained silent as she carries jack into his bed room chambers. Jack sat down crisscross inside Julie’s open palm, looking up at her face, which didn’t even glance to look at him. Julie was pissed and jack knew it, and the one thing he didn’t want to do was make this giant women anymore angry than she already was.

On their way to jacks bed room chambers, jack saw many giant doors and many different hallways that went all in different directions of the large castle. He couldn’t wonder where those certain hallways and doors led. Jack always had a heart of a adventurer this was pretty obvious as he continued to stare at these hallways and Doors filled with mystery.

“I believe that we have all have had enough fun for today don’t you think, my lord.”

Jack turns around to see Julie looking down right at jack with irritated eyes.

“Uh yea sorry.” Jack say with a little wimpier.

Julie and jack after a few minutes finally make it back to jacks kingly room. Julie walks towards the bed and gently places jack on the top of the sheets. Jack standing on top of his bed stares at Julie who towers over him as she stands on her two feet staring down at jack with a stern look. Jacks bed almost reached up to Julie’s hips.

“Gulp”

Jack was feeling a little afraid. He had just met Julie and already he knew she wasn’t the kind of person you wanted to get angry.

Julie after a few seconds of standing up looking down at jack finally gets on her knees. Julie brings her giant face a few inches away from jack. Julie was so close that jack could feel her breath run through his face.

“Jack what you did was very dangerous.” Julie says letting out a little sigh.

“Sorry Julie I didn’t know how dangerous the forest could be.” Jack says rubbing his head.

Jack looking at Julie’s mountain sized face sees something he didn’t expect to see. Tears, tears started to run down Julie’s face, tears that were able to completely drench jack with water.

“What would I have done if something had happened to you.” 😭

Jack was taken back from Julie’s reaction he had never had anyone other than his mother care for him to such a extent. Jack walks towards Julie’s right hand that was resting on the side of the bed and pats one of Julie’s giant fingers that towered over him with ease.

“Their, their I’m alright Julie, so please don’t cry, ok?” Jack says with a little smile.

Jack could tell that Julie wanted to yell at him, but she was obviously watching her tone because she cared about him a lot. In truth jack felt flattered and honored to have someone like Julie in his life.

“Yes I’m alive thanks to Catherine.” Jack says thinking back to the giant amazon that was even taller than Julie.

Julie had finally stopped crying and was staring down at jack with eyes filled with peace. Julie wore a small smile on her face as if she was willing to let today’s little incident slide, which jack wanted more than anything.

“Yes we are very lucky that Catherine was their to protect you.” Julie says with a relieved tone.

It was all so much for Jack to take in. Here he was, a normal guy who wasn't special in any way. Now a race of beautiful giantesses wanted to make him their king?! And what about his family? His father had died when he was 12 years old. Life had been kinda hard for Jack's mother. So he had stayed and helped her support his little brother and sister, Coop and Alice.

Jack looked up Julie whom had a kind smile on her face. "Jack, is there anything you need?"

She also had green glasses and red heel shoes. she was holding a clip board in one hand and a pen in another.

"Hello Master," she spoke in a prim proper voice which reminded Jack of a teacher he once had. "My name is Sandra Watson. My job is to advise you on how to behave as a king. I assume that Julie has already explain why you were brought here?"

She's gonna be a lot of fun Jack thought to himself.

Jack was wondering what he should do, he just finished working on a project for work, and his family was on vacation. As he walk around he decided to walk in the garden in the park. As he walked he look around. It was getting late and there was no one around. He then saw a glowing rock in the middle of the pond. Jack looked at the rock and could make out a line of words.

"What makes a man a fair king?"

For some reason Jack said. "Wisdom to rule and a heart to understand."

As soon as he said this the glowing rock sent a beam of light in to the night sky. Jack took a step back as the light opened, showing a swirling vortex. He had little time to enjoy the light show when a dark hand came out of it and grabbed him. He tried to fight the grip as the hand enveloped him and pulled him into the portal, which quickly snapped shut after the hand was inside. The rock then went back under the water.

Jack woke up in a field. As he looked around he could feel someone watching him. As he stood up, he felt as if he was tossed in a dryer set on high, and then proceeded to have a one too many drinks. As he moved he could make out things.
Grass, a lake, a few trees, a girl that the size of a mountain, some acorns scattered around... It took Jack a few seconds before he did a double take.
Yes, it was a girl that was the size of a mountain. And she was watching him.

"So you're finally awake." the girl said as she sat up. She moved her hand down slowly. Jack freaked out decided to run. He got about a few feet before he was picked up in her hand. She used only the amount of pressure she needed to pick him off the ground, being sure to use a soft grip so as not to hurt him.

"Please stop moving around so much. I really don't want to drop you, master." The girl said as she held you up to her eye level.

"Master?" Jack said as he stopped.

She placed him in her hand. "Yes, you where chosen by our goddess to rule over us. I'm a lucky girl who was chosen to be a servant to our new king." she said smiling.

Now that you are this close to her, you could tell that she wasn't actually a human. She appeared to be an anthro version of a...

14.content:
Jack laid out on his bed, another day of work done. It wasn't that he thought work was boring, his life was very normal, I mean sure he stopped to feed any random animal he found but that was the only somewhat special thing about him. Sighing, he just stared at the ceiling wondering if he should maybe go to a bar or something to escape the routine of his life. Deciding to take a nap, he started to fall asleep when a sound like an explosion sent him shooting about a foot in the air as he quickly looked around for the source of the noise. He turned just as the air in front of the door to his room literally ripped itself apart in a jagged white line. That white line slowly started to spin upon itself until it became some swirling blue vortex. That's when the voice appeared in his head, it sounded female and honestly kind of bored as it spoke. "You have been chosen, you must enter the portal, however you will be tested, if you cannot enter the portal your memory will be wiped and you will remember none of this."

Jack just stared at the swirling vortex for a second, annoyed that some random voice was not only telling him what to do but that it was already underestimating him. He stepped onto the floor and instantly it felt like there were weights attached to each of his limbs. He slowly started half walking/half dragging himself towards the portal, as he reached about halfway to it even though it wasn't far he suddenly felt more tired then he had ever felt in his life. However the voice appeared in his head again this time actually encouraging "come on, you can make it." The voice instantly woke Jack up and he pushed himself till he was standing right in front of the portal, however he wasn't sure he had the energy to make it through. He head the voice again "go, just one last push" it shouts at him sounding almost frantic. Summoning all the strength he had left Jack threw himself through the portal the feeling of sleep overcoming him as he fully entered and he fell asleep.

Jack woke up slowly to the sound of a soft voice singing what he could only assume was a lullaby. He slowly got up the first thing he saw was he was laying on some sort of furry carpet but he froze as his vision slowly traveled upwards finally locking eyes with the one singing. She was a vixen; that much was evident from the black fur on her hands and feet, white on the tip of her bushy tail, and redish-orange everywhere else including her face. However, she still looked quite human. Jack could tell her body was slim and well taken care of, as even under the fur he could make out her body creating an hourglass shape. Her furry form was covered in what looked like a pair of khaki shorts and a purple t-shirt that was doing a very poor job of containing a pair of perfectly round F-cup breasts. She had a small honestly quite cute muzzle and small black ears sticking out of the top of her head, however the thing you noticed the most were her eyes. They were a light icy blue and they stared straight at you. The final thing Jack figured out was her size, he was gently pushed over by her smallest finger telling him the vixen had to be all of 250ft tall and one of her fingers was bigger then he was.

The vixen started to sing the same lullaby and her finger started to gently stroke his back.

"What is she doing" he thinks.

"I'm trying to calm you master, I wouldn't think it would be easy being transported across dimensions" she says.

"What the hell?! Did you just-"

"Read your mind?" she says finishing your sentence. "Yes. Just to let you know, master, I can read your mind as well as project my thoughts into yours. It'll help me take care of you" she says.

Jack slowly started to sit up.

"If she wanted to hurt me, she would have already" he thought to himself.

He then felt the furry digit move to let him get into a sitting position.

"Where am I?" he asks.

"This is Macross, the name's derived from your word for really large animals, as well as the fact that all of our kings have had to cross dimensions." she replies.

"Yeah, about that, why do you keep calling me master?" he asks.

"Why, because your our new king of course! Doesn't this sound familiar?" she says the final bit directly into his mind.

He instantly recognized it as the same voice that showed up in his head that weird vortex appeared. Jack just sat there staring up at this giant Vixen

"Wait, wait, wait, wait... Are you telling me that I'm supposed to be your king?" he asks.

She nods slowly and smiles

"You passed the test, so you get the crown" she says a large smile on her face.

"Why is a human the king of a race of giant, pardon the phrase, furries?" he asks.

"Our Goddess Aleera fell for a human once about a thousand years ago and he was the kindest and most generous king we ever had. That, and the fact that Aleera kind of developed a thing for humans. She decreed that from that point on each of our leaders was to be a human male who she had personally chosen and who had shown the determination to come here" she says.

Jack simply nods slowly. It made about as much sense as anything else in this situation.

"So, you are?" he asks.

"Oh my, I'm so sorry..." she says as she holds her hand out and bows to him.

"I am Vera, your personal adviser, guard, and hopefully I will become your trusted friend."

She says the last bit with her head raised, and a quite cute smile spread over her muzzle. Jack just nods again, and he then takes a few seconds to look around. He was in a castle, that much was evident given that there was a four-poster bed that could hold 4 Vera's. One wall of the room was an open balcony with only translucent silk drapes separating the balcony and the room. All around the room were masterfully carved pieces of furniture all fit for something Vera's size and all looking like they had been painstakingly carved out of 1 piece of wood. The door was much the same but it was adorned with an ornate drawing of what looked like a unicorn girl holding up another human. Jack's gaze fell back on Vera, who smiled down at him.

"How do you like your bedroom?" she asks.

"Th-this is all mine?" he replies stunned and Vera gives off a small chuckle.

"Of course it is, master! Why? Is anything not to your liking?" she asks, her tone growing somewhat nervous at the end.

"No, no, this is more than I could ever dream of having..." he says before pointing at what looked like a small jewellery box.

"That's about as big as my bedroom back home" he says.

Vera walks over and lifts the box up for a second before smiling and putting it down

"Well then, welcome to the lap of luxury master! Don't worry, we'll all take excellent care of you!" she says.

Jack just sits down the calmness from before disappearing as his mind tried to make sense of everything

"But I didn't do anything to deserve this... Why was I chosen? I'm just a normal guy..." he says.

Suddenly, Jack's mind was flooded with images of every animal he had ever helped, as well as visions of how he showed each of his colleagues respect; even Jim, who admittedly was a total ass just because he was the boss' son. The next thing he knew, Jack was staring at Vera mostly eye to eye.

"Master, you are kind, patient, forgiving, and you treat even those who are not human with respect and dignity. That is why you have been chosen." she states.

Jack just nods once more in reply, still having trouble taking in all that was happening in such a short time, before....
14.title: Welcome to Macross!

info.brief_description: A man finds himself on a world filled with giant women, all of whom see him as their king!
info.description:
<If you are reading this message, it means that this story is in need of new additions. I'm willing to offer 500 gift points for each chapter added. However, as I am currently very busy with college and other real life things, I may not notice new chapters for quite some time. If you want your gift points immediately, please message me that you added so that I can get back to you.>


(choice chapters are not included in the offer and you will not receive gift points for writing them.)

Jack was just an ordinary man. Normal job, normal family, normal life... Nothing would make him stand out in a crowd at all, yet he was destined for something unbelievable: he was chosen to be the king of a race of giantesses!

Rules:
1) no killing Jack
2) no futa
3) no giant males
4) the giantesses can have just about any type of personality you want, but if Jack tells them to do something (or not to do something), then they have to listen to him
5) the giantesses average about 250 feet tall, but I'll allow them to be anywhere from 100 feet tall (in the case of a very young girl) to 300 feet tall (since some people are a lot taller than average)
6) the technology on their homeworld is quite advanced compared to earth, and they have mastered inter-dimensional travel
7) they may or may not have super powers, and they may have a human appearance or be furries (this will be chosen at the start of the story)
8) Jack is supposed to be a nice guy, so I don't want to see him abusing his powers. This includes sending the giantesses on a mission to take over the earth, forcing them to be his sex slaves against their will, etc. (that's not to say that he can't have sex with them, but I just don't want him to be getting portrayed as the bad guy)

In order to improve the reading experience, I'll try to correct any spelling and grammar mistakes I find. I also reserve the right to make minor alterations to chapters if it is necessary to insert detail or correct one of the above rules being broken. If a chapter is too poorly written for me to fix, then it will be deleted. Chapters that I have to delete will not qualify for the GP reward.
